is used to assign a value to a global variable. (-> [[IntermediateLanguage]])

h1. format

<pre><code>["assign-global", <str_variable_name>, <opecodes_next>]</code></pre>

h1. example

program:
<pre><code>(define a 99)</code></pre>

compiled:
<pre><code>[constant 99
[assign-global "a"
[halt]]]</code></pre>
